test-case.description: Response message from API:{"success":{"message":"Rush note has been added successfully","result":{"txId":118359,"statusCode":200,"body":"{\"transactionId\": 118359, \"noteId\": 3715, \"readMessage\": false, \"clientOrderID\": \"672023\", \"userID\": 872178, \"sendEmail\": null, \"noteDateTime\": \"02-29-2024 06:46:05\", \"note\": \"A Rush request has been made for this transaction Testing Process Testing Process Testing Process begin\", \"noteCategory\": \"CLIENT_PORTAL\", \"noteType\": \"PUBLIC\", \"userEmail\": \"title@bluelandtitle.com\", \"userName\": null, \"aesNoteDateTime\": \"02-29-2024 11:46:05\", \"searcherID\": 0, \"backOfficeTransactionStatus\": null}"},"endpointsresult":{"statusCode":200,"body":"\"{\\n \\\"userId\\\": 1,\\n \\\"id\\\": 1,\\n \\\"title\\\": \\\"sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit\\\",\\n \\\"body\\\": \\\"quia et suscipit\\\\nsuscipit recusandae consequuntur expedita et cum\\\\nreprehenderit molestiae ut ut quas totam\\\\nnostrum rerum est autem sunt rem eveniet architecto\\\"\\n}\""}}}
